bibl.title: Change and Continuity in the Administration of Ptolemaic Lycia: A Note on P. Tebt. I 8. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Tebt. I, 8 preserves summaries of 4 letters by the dioiketes in Alexandria. Only 3 letters were sent to Nikostratos and one to another chief financial official of Lycia.
GYGAX Marc Domingo, Change and Continuity in the Administration of Ptolemaic Lycia: A Note on P. Tebt. I 8. Avec résumé en anglais.
